website_summaries.verdict: For under $20, this MCT oil is a bargain for anyone looking for an uptick in energy and focus or to jumpstart weight loss.
pros: Regular consumption of this oil helps to regulate digestive system
Can be easily mixed with cold liquids without leaving an oily residue
32-ounce bottle contains oil well without any spills or leaks

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised...In a plastic bottle, not glass.
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered NOW MCT oil in a glass jar for years. This was shown as a glass bottle but arrived in a plastic bottle. I have read where things leach into the oil via a plastic bottle so I do not use plastic. I have mad 3 calls to this company WOOHOO with no return call. I tried to do a review on "their" sight and it blocks me. I have 30 days to return this PLASTIC bottle and cannot get a pre-paid return label since they will not return my call. DO NOT ORDER FROM THIS COMPANY!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: OIB lady

customer_reviews.title: Made Us Sick
customer_reviews.text: I normally use Garden of Life MCT oil but it is much more expensive so I decided to give this brand a try. This oil didn’t taste right.. it is most likely rancid or has an additive. It is more viscous and made both my husband and I sick to our stomach. In this case I’m going back to the more expensive brand. We can see and feel the difference. Beware this product is quite inferior or no quality control and it is rancid. What is NOW foods going to do to correct this? My neighbor also bought some and she got sick too!
customer_reviews.author: Terri van de Sande

customer_reviews.title: It's OK, but not for us
customer_reviews.text: I like this, but maybe it doesn't like us, my wife & I. Most times I took it, in my coffee, I was fine, but a few times I had stomach upsets, mostly just a stomach ache. My wife's response included diarrhea, so it was worse, & she stopped taking it. In general, I like it but stomach pain & diarrhea kinda' ruined it for us. I may try another brand, but not anytime soon. for now, we'll stick to coconut oil
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Steedley

customer_reviews.title: does nothing
customer_reviews.text: I did not experience any benefit from using this product. I have used the entire quantity over several months. This does not come sealed, so it is also impossible to determine whether the product is safe or pure. I’ve used other brands and felt that they were beneficial, but this one did not seem to benefit me at all.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love, Love this product. We drink MCT oil daily in our shakes, coffees, and teas. We have been using NOW products for years now and love the quality and form they come in. This is a glass jar, not plastic. Large quantity for a fair price. We could buy it a bit cheaper at local brick and mortar store but not this brand. We will continue to consume this daily and continue to order this wonderful product. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: kristian Crump

customer_reviews.title: I wish I read the ingredients not happy about Palm Oil
customer_reviews.text: I have bought many products by NOW foods and have always been satisfied. I am really disappointed that this product contains palm oil with all of its know negative health effects. I blame myself for not reading closer but I just took for granted that this company was good.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: On the keto diet, down 22 pounds in 5 ...
customer_reviews.text: On the keto diet, down 22 pounds in 5 weeks, and MCT is part of the equation. Can't really separate which parts of the diet are more effective, but I'm keeping this in the rotation. As some others have mentioned, start slow and get used to it. I too had a close call on my second day using it!
customer_reviews.author: E Klausmeyer

customer_reviews.title: Such a great fat-burning breakfast and I've been doing this for over ...
customer_reviews.text: I add some to my coffee in the mornings with equal amounts of unsalted butter and do so about 4 times a week. Such a great fat-burning breakfast and I've been doing this for over a month now and have lost about 5-6 lbs so far! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lex

customer_reviews.title: I use it in my coffee in am and I ...
customer_reviews.text: I use it in my coffee in am and I think it helps curb my appetite, My colon health is more robust also.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Grap

customer_reviews.title: Do your research! This brand is great 👍
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that this brand does not have lauric acid in their mct oil. Definitely do your research on mct oil, especially lauric acid. The major thing I notice when I take this is that my digestive system is balanced. No bloating and no constipation! Start your dose small then work your way up day by day. Start with a tsp, next day a tsp and a half, until you work your way up to a tbs.
customer_reviews.author: melissa henry

customer_reviews.title: ... Doctor and Awakening from Alzheimer's said this is a good alternative to other oils
customer_reviews.text: My Doctor and Awakening from Alzheimer's said this is a good alternative to other oils, also Organic Coconut oil for salads and very low heat under 300 degrees F when cooking. Both are good for smoothies. One table spoon for each smoothie. Coconut oil needs to be warmed up or it will leave small chucks in the smoothie. One or two table spoons in the microwave for 15 seconds will do the job. Coconut oil becomes solid at below 75 degrees F. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Ram Bam!

customer_reviews.title: This product works if you use common sense and follow a low carb diet
customer_reviews.text: This product comes in a glass bottle so take care of when opening and handling at first. I am on a low-carb diet and use it when I want to get back in ketosis. It works for me. Keep in mind that you can't go eating over 50 grams carbohydrates daily and expect it to work miracles to put you into ketosis. It is not a miracle supplement, there are no miracle supplements. You have to use common sense. So if you do have common sense it will work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: NOT glass Bottle
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why they changed the container to plastic and not glass. Disappointing because this dynamic makes it such a less healthy choice.
customer_reviews.author: HappyKicks12

customer_reviews.title: Not getting what's shown on my order
customer_reviews.text: I received a different looking product, does not match what I ordered and I hate not getting what I ordered
customer_reviews.author: Jeff goldblum

customer_reviews.title: This stuff will change your life
customer_reviews.text: Speeds up weight loss, lowered my cholesterol and makes your skin brighter..... but it tastes like death
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Top it off ....
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item several months ago for someone. She is so pleased that I decided to get it for myself. Love that it comes in a glass bottle - brown at that. Packaging super secure. As for the oil, I use it primarily after bathing - in between bathing and an overall moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Bambi

customer_reviews.title: Keto necessity
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to MCT. Been using this brand for 2 years on Keto with not complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product.
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this product for over 2 years. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Iriz

customer_reviews.title: Plastic Is NOT Healthy
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for two years and swear by it. However, I just reordered and to my surprise, the product came in a plastic bottle. This is a health product and the latest reports show that plastic bottles have health issues. The packaging is counterproductive to the purpose of this product hence the 3 stars. I will be looking for a new source with my next order
customer_reviews.author: J. Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: sustained energy
customer_reviews.text: it is good i used to take competitors and it is just as good and is cheaper . the only thing i don't like is that it is glass. i put in the old bottle i had. sometimes gets slipper b/c of oil and if drop glass will have really bad mess to clean
customer_reviews.author: beans361

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I received the MCR Oil earlier this week. I have been taken a tablespoon of oil right before breakfast and lunch. It does bother my stomach a small bit, but not enough to not take it. I do see that I have more energy and have dropped three (3) pounds in the last four (4) days. I would highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: ddreamer

customer_reviews.title: gut ache.
customer_reviews.text: I have been getting guy aches and after reading these reviews, I will stop taking this product. However, I find if I rub it on my hips, it helps with my mild arthritis . Using it topically is helpful, but i will never take it internally again.
customer_reviews.author: meme

customer_reviews.title: A good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Good product. The bottle was sealed and packaged well so that it didn't leak all over in transit. The MCT oil seems to be of good quality and flavor. Would have been 5 stars but the bottle is very hard to pour and tends to dribble down the side, making this heavy jar very slick.
customer_reviews.author: MamaMishap

customer_reviews.title: GREAT brand of MCT Oil. Works great on my Ketogenic Diet!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT brand of MCT Oil. Works great on my Ketogenic Diet. I take a 1/2 tbsp in the morning with my colloidal minerals, and another once or twice more throughout the day. REALLY helps if I'm doing an intermittent fasting day and not eating until dinner! LOVE the NOW Foods brand.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Ballard

customer_reviews.title: Plastic container & unusual flavor
customer_reviews.text: We were disappointed to see that this is now being packaged in a plastic container, the flavor was not right at all. It made the whole dish taste “off.” It might have been rancid or maybe they changed the formula. Either way, it was different from this same product we’ve purchased before. We were expecting a glass jar which is what most MCT oil comes in. We will be looking for a new brand despite purchasing the NOW MCT oil for several years.
customer_reviews.author: Violet

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Oil For A Healthy Body
customer_reviews.text: Excellent oil easy to take even if alone by the spoonful. We use in salad dressing and drizzle over food like baked sweet potato. This is a healthy great oil and helps lubricate your body assisting with elimination. Also great for weight loss assistance and energy expenditure.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: I love this oil
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil. I'm doing the ketogenic diet, and was informed that this is a great oil to use, due to its thermogenic properties, as well as it's great flavor. I am very pleased, thusfar.
customer_reviews.author: J. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: I use this everyday in my smoothies to get my healthy fats. I like the fact that it's liquid versus a solid. To be honest, not sure how much it helps, but my doctor is happy, so I am also.
customer_reviews.author: Sleenie

customer_reviews.title: Where’s the Glass Bottle? Deal breaker...
customer_reviews.text: I have used NOW MCT Oil for years...not only a great oil BUT was delivered in a GLASS bottle...today, I received my oil in a plastic bottle. I feel very misled by the NOW company...using the amber bottle and NOT telling us it will come in a PLASTIC one is a misrepresentation. Sorry, this is going back...
customer_reviews.author: Pattee C Sipple

customer_reviews.title: Best way to wake up
customer_reviews.text: I love this hazelnut vanilla flavor you have a serving in your coffee daily and you will not only have a boost of energy but the big plus was the hunger restriction!

customer_reviews.title: Great value, good quality, slightly unpleasant flavor.
customer_reviews.text: Good MCT. I like the fact that it comes in a glass bottle. Don't like the flavor, not sure if I got an off batch, but the bottle I got has a mild burnt plastic with a hint of coconut flavor. Not enough to notice in coffee, but noticeable but itself or in "bulletproof" matcha. Great value though.
customer_reviews.author: kgal

customer_reviews.title: Great for bulletproof coffee!
customer_reviews.text: MCT Oil is hard to review because there are so many variations and they all taste almost exactly the same. The best thing about NOW foods brand is that you can get it in the glass bottle which is rare. For the money its worth it for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Fearn

customer_reviews.title: Great product...AMAZON PACKING SUX
customer_reviews.text: The product is great... However AMAZONS PACKAGING leaves a lot to be desired. There was ABSOLUTELY NO PACKING and the lid was broken...so now i have an open bottle and no way to seal it shut.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Scott

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This mct oil is great. It's tasteless, and goes down easy. It's a great source of energy. It's also great with helping your body to get into ketosis quicker, if you're doing keto. I strongly suggest that unless you take mct oil regularly that you slowly work up to 2 tablespoons. Trust me or your butt will be sorry. Start out with a teaspoon the work your way up over the next week or 2.
customer_reviews.author: Olana

customer_reviews.title: Stored in Plastic container, not glass
customer_reviews.text: This product is ok. A friend recommended it. A few disappointments I have is, (1) it's in a plastic bottle instead of glass and (2), it has only 50% C8 and 30% C10 so I was a bit confused as to what the other 20% is? Think I will go back to my original glass stored product. I do however, use other "NOW" products which I am very pleased with, and will continue to purchase them.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Best price here.
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this about 5 times. I love it and the best price is here.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal.
customer_reviews.text: Flavorless, odorless and colorless. I have issues staying regular I add this onto my coffee every morning and it does just the thing. It keep paper towels underneath it on my counter to prevent a permanent ring on my counter.

customer_reviews.title: Try it in your coffee to kickstart your day
customer_reviews.text: This stuff will spike up any drink you put it into. You will get a boost of energy that will last for hours. Try it in your coffee to kick start your day. It's fantastic.

customer_reviews.title: I've been happy with the Now products and there is not much ...

A whole lot cheaper to buy this from Amazon than the brands sold in local stores. It's oil, its greasy, seems like it gets on everything.

customer_reviews.text: MCT Oil is great to reduce Triglycerides and during Keto Diet. I use this for my Keto Coffee which adds great taste to coffee and helps reducing bad cholesterol and Triglycerides.

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is great. Use it in my home-made non-dairy coffee creamer
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. Use it in my home-made non-dairy coffee creamer...my own version of the popular bulletproof coffee craze. And use it in recipes sometimes when I don't feel like digging into the coconut oil and melting it down. Works great!

customer_reviews.title: GLASS BOTTLE...could use a pouring spout
customer_reviews.text: BOTTLED IN GLASS. I try to avoid plastic and it is so hard to find an MCT oil that is in a glass container. This is in glass, ships fast and works great. The 4 star rating is due to the pourability (is that a word?). It almost always drips down the side some when pouring...some sort of spout would make it a 5 start product. But still...this is the best you'll find on Amazon.

I use MCT for all the health benefits as well as a natural pick me up. Would be even better if they included a pump to dispense since pouring always causes some dripping through jar.

customer_reviews.author: Grandma liz

customer_reviews.title: The Jury is Still Out
customer_reviews.text: The jury is still out on this product, so I'm only going to give it three stars. I have been on the ketogenic diet since May, and my weight loss has been very slow. However, I feel great and am not ready to give up. I purchased this bottle of MCT Oil because most of the literature that I've read regarding MCT oil says it's essential to a ketogenic life style. I'm also a sucker for anything that promises quick weight loss, and these words are printed on the bottle. I will continue to use this bottle of MCT oil until I finish it, and will report back if I notice any remarkable changes.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Acks

customer_reviews.title: There no taste to it  so I can still taste my coffee

customer_reviews.title: Great price and great brand

customer_reviews.title: Pure MCT oil for your Bulletproof Coffee!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for when I tried to do Bulletproof Coffee. I this if you're looking for MCT Oil, this stuff is great. A lot of the other stuff on the internet is made with low quality ingredients, or is way too expensive. Personally, I went through this bottle and am probably done with the whole Bulletproof Coffee Trial. I prefer my coffee black, and would other consume coconut milk or coconut oil than something that is processed. I'm still leaving 5 stars because if you want to give BPC a shot, try the NOW Foods brand before you drop the money on overpriced gimmick brands.

customer_reviews.title: Taste great
customer_reviews.text: Low price, nice taste, and no odor. Will purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Michele Asher

customer_reviews.title: Get Your Dose of Good Fats!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for making bulletproof coffee! It's clear, odorless, and completely tasteless. The heavy brown glass bottle insures no contamination from any chemicals found in plastic bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Gyropilot

customer_reviews.title: Where have you been my whole life?
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I used to drink a lot of coffee and energy drinks. Now I put the mct in my morning coffee and I'm good to go for the rest of the day. I don't think it curbs my hunger but I do notice I fill up faster leading to eating less
customer_reviews.author: MM370

customer_reviews.title: Great supplement
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff. Don't do more than one tsp per day until your body adjusts
customer_reviews.author: August Spillers

customer_reviews.title: Works Wonders
customer_reviews.text: Great quality oil. I could really start seeing an immediate difference when I started putting it in my coffee daily! Really curbs appetite and improves clarity.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Is a great product. Quality of product exceeds expectations
customer_reviews.text: Received order very quickly. It was packaged well. Is a great product. Quality of product exceeds expectations. Will definitely order again.
